attributes.action: Ensure power is no longer cut on National Railways for trespassers on the line.
attributes.additional_details: On 7th Nov A trespassers on the line near East Croydon caused major delays and emergency services to be called.
attributes.background: Trespassers are a nuisance to commuters and rail companies. There is no benefit to preserving those who want to risk their life. Any cost of delays caused in the event of an incident should also be charged to the trespasser or their estate.
